text: APhA spoke with two #pharmacy experts in immunization—APhA President @profhogue and Stephan Foster, APhA liaison to CDC’s ACIP—to talk about the EUA of the Pfizer-BioNTech #COVID19 #vaccine. Get the latest #LockedonPharmacy through @PharmacyPodcast:  https://t.co/uq3yHZPlhP https://t.co/UAFZeDrb0W
